channel.title: [RSSD] Think you're a good coder? Want to make $? Come here!
channel.description:
I am in the middle of setting something up, and am calling all good coders (i.e. people I've heard of) to join in.
[QUOTE]What is RPGW - RSSD?
RPGW - RSSD stands for:
RPG World - RuneScape Server Development
It is a small 'company' started by me, in which I will code RuneScape Private Servers for an amount of $ or RS2 GP.
The official site for this 'company' is http://runescape.rpgw.org, which will have prices, order forms, contact details etc.
The way it works: - You fill out an order form (if I can get it working) and I work out the cost. - I email you back the price it will be, and you 'Accept' or 'Decline'. - If you accept, I will begin working on the server, as you specify, and when done I will email you. - I will host the server for about 10 minutes for you, so you can see if you like it, and if so we will set up the payment. - Once payment is completed, I will host the server in a .rar file, in a secret link on the site. - You download the server, and once downloaded, I take it off so nobody else can get it.
If you think you would like this, fill out the order form at http://runescape.rpgw.org, or if it isn't working, email me at: budda@rpgw.org.
~ Budda[/QUOTE]
[QUOTE]Staff Application Format
Want to become a staff member for RPGW - RSSD? Fill out theis application and post it in these forums then.
Staff will get all the $/RS2 GP made from each client if they do the whole server themselves. Otherwise the $/RS2 GP made will be split evenly into whoever worked on the server.
Staff Application
Name: Aka: Country of residence: Timezone: Java Experience:
~ Budda[/QUOTE]
Interested? Join www.rpgw.org/forums and sign up at: http://www.rpgw.org/forums/viewforum.php?f=5
~ Budda

item.title: [RSSD] Think you're a good coder? Want to make $? Come here!

item.description:
@Budda wrote:

I am in the middle of setting something up, and am calling all good coders (i.e. people I’ve heard of) to join in.

[QUOTE]What is RPGW - RSSD?

RPGW - RSSD stands for:

RPG World - RuneScape Server Development

It is a small ‘company’ started by me, in which I will code RuneScape Private Servers for an amount of $ or RS2 GP.

The official site for this ‘company’ is http://runescape.rpgw.org, which will have prices, order forms, contact details etc.

The way it works:

  • You fill out an order form (if I can get it working) and I work out the cost.
  • I email you back the price it will be, and you ‘Accept’ or ‘Decline’.
  • If you accept, I will begin working on the server, as you specify, and when done I will email you.
  • I will host the server for about 10 minutes for you, so you can see if you like it, and if so we will set up the payment.
  • Once payment is completed, I will host the server in a .rar file, in a secret link on the site.
  • You download the server, and once downloaded, I take it off so nobody else can get it.

If you think you would like this, fill out the order form at http://runescape.rpgw.org, or if it isn’t working, email me at: budda@rpgw.org.

~ Budda[/QUOTE]

[QUOTE]Staff Application Format

Want to become a staff member for RPGW - RSSD? Fill out theis application and post it in these forums then.

Staff will get all the $/RS2 GP made from each client if they do the whole server themselves. Otherwise the $/RS2 GP made will be split evenly into whoever worked on the server.
